  "stage": "before_normalize",
  "plan": {
    "required_context": [
      "demo_qa"
    ],
    "context_plan": [
      {
        "provider": "demo_qa",
        "mode": "slice",
        "selectors": {
          "op": "query",
          "root_entity": "orders",
          "select": [
            {
              "expr": "count(order_id)",
              "alias": "order_count"
            }
          ],
          "filters": {
            "type": "logical",
            "op": "and",
            "clauses": [
              {
                "type": "comparison",
                "entity": "customers",
                "field": "city",
                "op": "=",
                "value": "San Antonio"
              },
              {
                "type": "comparison",
                "field": "order_date",
                "op": "starts_with",
                "value": "2022-03"
              }
            ]
          },
          "relations": [
            "orders_to_customers"
          ],
          "case_sensitivity": false
        },
        "max_tokens": 500
      }
    ],
    "adr_queries": null,
    "constraints": null,

    "dtos": []
